body_html:
Test failure is due to one flaky keras test (unrelated to this PR):

FAIL: test_stateful_metrics (__main__.KerasMetricsTest)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/tmpfs/tmp/bazel/execroot/org_tensorflow/bazel-out/k8-py3-opt/bin/bazel_pip/tensorflow/python/keras/metrics_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/bazel_pip/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/metrics_test.py", line 144, in test_stateful_metrics
    self.assertAllClose(outs[2], ref_true_pos(y, preds), atol=1e-5)
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 1190, in assertAllClose
    self._assertAllCloseRecursive(a, b, rtol=rtol, atol=atol, msg=msg)
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 1162, in _assertAllCloseRecursive
    path_str))
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 1102, in _assertArrayLikeAllClose
    a, b, rtol=rtol, atol=atol, err_msg=msg, equal_nan=True)
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/numpy/testing/nose_tools/utils.py", line 1396, in assert_allclose
    verbose=verbose, header=header, equal_nan=equal_nan)
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/numpy/testing/nose_tools/utils.py", line 779, in assert_array_compare
    raise AssertionError(msg)
AssertionError: 
Not equal to tolerance rtol=1e-06, atol=1e-05
Mismatched value: a is different from b.
(mismatch 100.0%)
 x: array(416, dtype=int32)
 y: array(414)

body:
Test failure is due to one flaky keras test (unrelated to this PR):
```
FAIL: test_stateful_metrics (__main__.KerasMetricsTest)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/tmpfs/tmp/bazel/execroot/org_tensorflow/bazel-out/k8-py3-opt/bin/bazel_pip/tensorflow/python/keras/metrics_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/bazel_pip/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/metrics_test.py", line 144, in test_stateful_metrics
    self.assertAllClose(outs[2], ref_true_pos(y, preds), atol=1e-5)
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 1190, in assertAllClose
    self._assertAllCloseRecursive(a, b, rtol=rtol, atol=atol, msg=msg)
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 1162, in _assertAllCloseRecursive
    path_str))
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/test_util.py", line 1102, in _assertArrayLikeAllClose
    a, b, rtol=rtol, atol=atol, err_msg=msg, equal_nan=True)
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/numpy/testing/nose_tools/utils.py", line 1396, in assert_allclose
    verbose=verbose, header=header, equal_nan=equal_nan)
  File "/tmpfs/src/github/tensorflow/tf_build_env/lib/python3.5/site-packages/numpy/testing/nose_tools/utils.py", line 779, in assert_array_compare
    raise AssertionError(msg)
AssertionError: 
Not equal to tolerance rtol=1e-06, atol=1e-05
Mismatched value: a is different from b.
(mismatch 100.0%)
 x: array(416, dtype=int32)
 y: array(414)
```
